title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AdTech Innovation with AI-Driven Development for Brand Agents (IND3334)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 基于AI驱动开发的品牌代理广告技术创新 (IND3334)
abstract: Discover how AdTechs can revolutionize creative advertising by developing autonomous AI Brand Agents using AWS's AI-Driven Development Lifecycle (AI-DLC)—a methodology designed to fully integrate AI capabilities into the fabric of software development—to compress months of traditional development. Join AWS technical leaders as they demonstrate how this transformative approach enables rapid development of multi-agent architectures, brand-specific vector databases, and API-first systems that power the next generation of AdTech innovation. Learn how to replicate this sprint model, implement domain-driven AI development, and scale autonomous brand-safe AI solutions across your organization.
abstract_cn: 了解AdTech如何通过使用AWS的AI驱动开发生命周期(AI-DLC)开发自主AI品牌代理来革新创意广告——这是一种旨在将AI能力完全集成到软件开发结构中的方法论——将传统开发的数月时间压缩。与AWS技术领导者一起，了解这种变革性方法如何实现多代理架构、品牌特定向量数据库和API优先系统的快速开发，从而推动下一代AdTech创新。学习如何复制这种冲刺模型，实施领域驱动的AI开发，并在整个组织中扩展自主品牌安全的AI解决方案。
